channel.title: seanreiser tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from seanreiser.

item.description: As I say, in tech 53 is the new 85 - https://t.co/aIls76LRqK via @seanreiser
item.source:markdown: As I say, in tech 53 is the new 85 - https://t.co/aIls76LRqK via @seanreiser

item.description: An Open Letter to Congresswoman Ocasio-Cortez - https://t.co/658njdlx8b cc:@AOC @RepAOC
item.source:markdown: An Open Letter to Congresswoman Ocasio-Cortez - https://t.co/658njdlx8b cc:@AOC @RepAOC

item.description: A local Popeye's has one of those Coca-Cola Freestyle machines. It was a little unusual because it didn't have a touchscreen, instead you join their WiFi network, scan the QR code with your phone... - https://t.co/iQohWGeMr5 via @seanreiser
item.source:markdown: A local Popeye's has one of those Coca-Cola Freestyle machines. It was a little unusual because it didn't have a touchscreen, instead you join their WiFi network, scan the QR code with your phone... - https://t.co/iQohWGeMr5 via @seanreiser

item.description: @NancyLeeGrahn I'm of such mixed opinions here. I support making it easier for a person to vote, but I'm a technologist who spends a good deal of time thinking of man-in-the-middle attacks, I can easily see how drop boxes can be abused to intercept, change or discard votes.
item.source:markdown: @NancyLeeGrahn I'm of such mixed opinions here. I support making it easier for a person to vote, but I'm a technologist who spends a good deal of time thinking of man-in-the-middle attacks, I can easily see how drop boxes can be abused to intercept, change or discard votes.

item.description: I've been using dictation on my Mac more and more, saving my carpal tunnel ridden hands for coding. I was writing something about Star Trek: Strange New Worlds and I found it funny that no matter... - https://t.co/SPqLjrRYfZ via @seanreiser https://t.co/IEfldRMvA9
item.source:markdown: I've been using dictation on my Mac more and more, saving my carpal tunnel ridden hands for coding. I was writing something about Star Trek: Strange New Worlds and I found it funny that no matter... - https://t.co/SPqLjrRYfZ via @seanreiser https://t.co/IEfldRMvA9

item.description:
@jnettik It was a good talk.

I have ppl around me that have health issues so I'm still not in a position to attend camps / cons yet. Since I can't be in a room with 100's of my DrupalFam, I'm going through sessions I couldn't attend in the past for professional growth.
item.source:markdown:
@jnettik It was a good talk.
I have ppl around me that have health issues so I'm still not in a position to attend camps / cons yet. Since I can't be in a room with 100's of my DrupalFam, I'm going through sessions I couldn't attend in the past for professional growth.

item.description:
@RealMickFoley @HeyHeyItsConrad Love the podcast, a piece of advice: you shouldn't follow your touching stories of Santa with a blue chew spot.

#FoleyIsPod

@RealMickFoley @HeyHeyItsConrad For the future the phrases “The visit may be 5 mins, it may be an hour, it depends on how long it needs to be” and “hot tag for your weiner” probably needs an hour between them.

#FoleyIsPod
@jnettik Just a quick thank you. I watched your session about #Drupal's Cacheing API from Drupaldelphia the other day over lunch.
item.source:markdown: @jnettik Just a quick thank you. I watched your session about #Drupal's Cacheing API from Drupaldelphia the other day over lunch.
